bitfield.description: Enable data cache clean as data cache clean/invalidate
Disable ReadUnique request for prefetch streams initiated by STB accesses
Disable prefetch streams initiated from STB accesses
Number of independent dat aprefetch streams
Configure teh sequence length that triggers data prefetch streams
Disable optimized Data Memory Barrier behavior
L1 D-cache data RAM error injection enable
Index address of the first memory error
Log2 number of words in smallest cache line (data/unified)
Log2 number of words in smallest inst cache line
Vector iteration count - always 1s in ARMv8
Trap Data/Unified Cache Maintenance Instructions to PoC
Trap Data/Unified Cache Maintenance Instructions by Set/Way
Asynchornous Abort and Error Interrupt Routing
Virtualization MMU enable for EL1 and EL0 stage 2 address translation
Support for 4KB memory translation granule size
Support for 64KB memory translation granule size
Support for 16KB memory translation granule size
A and R profile PSR manipulation instructions
Support for memory system lock bus for SWP or SWPB
M profile instructions to modify PSRs
Level 1 Unified cache by Virtual Address
Level 1 Harvard cache by Virtual Address
Data Abort exception translation table format
Register width control for lower exception levels (1=AArch64)
External Abort and SError Interrupt Routing (1=EL3)
Endianness of explicit data accesses at EL0 (0=Little-endian)
Enable EL0 access to DC ZVA
Stack alignment check enable for EL0
MMU enable for EL1 and EL0 stage 1 address translation
MMU enable for EL2 stage 1 address translation
MMU enable for EL3 stage 1 address translation
Top byte ignored for TTBR1_EL1 region
Top byte ignored for TTBR0_EL1 region

Selects whether TTBR0_EL1 (0) or TTBR1_EL1 (1) defines the ASID
Size offset of memory region addressed by TTBR1_EL1
